Library resources: I would visit the library to access physical books and other resources that I can use to continue my work or studies.
Collaboration with others: I would reach out to my classmates or colleagues to collaborate on the assignment or studies. This would allow me to continue my work or studies with the help of others.
Mobile devices: I would use my mobile devices such as my smartphone or tablet to continue my work or studies. These devices can be used to access online resources and communicate with others.
Alternative study methods: I would explore alternative study methods such as studying outside, using flashcards or mnemonic devices to remember information.
Time management: I would focus on time management and prioritize my tasks to ensure that I am making the most of my time without a computer.
